meanings.definition: A place where yarn or thread is spun.
meanings.sent1: The spinneries in the village are where they make yarn.
meanings.sent2: We visited the local spinneries to see how thread is made.
meanings.sent3: The spinneries were so busy that the yarn started to dance around!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a web of thoughts, each one a different color in the spinneries of her imagination.
meanings.sent5: The spinneries hummed with the soothing sound of spinning yarn.

meanings.definition: The act of spinning yarn or thread.
meanings.sent1: Watching the spinneries in action was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of spinneries from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The spinneries seemed to have a mind of their own, twirling yarn with glee.
meanings.sent4: Time spun around her like the threads in a chaotic spinneries.
meanings.sent5: The spinneries spun yarn with such precision, it was like watching a dance.

meanings.definition: A machine used for spinning yarn or thread.
meanings.sent1: The new spinneries at the factory increased yarn production.
meanings.sent2: She operated the spinneries with skill and expertise.
meanings.sent3: The spinneries whirred to life, eager to start spinning.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, the spinneries were the unsung heroes of the textile industry.
meanings.sent5: The spinneries worked tirelessly, turning raw material into fine threads.
